Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItem(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item using the provided unique identifier or full path. The item will only be populated with basic information. In order to obtain all information about an item, you can use retrieveItemWithAttributes() or call IBMECMContentItem.retrieveAttributes().

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItem(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item using the provided unique identifier or full path synchronously. The item will only be populated with basic information. In order to obtain all information about an item, you can use retrieveItemWithAttributes() or call IBMECMContentItem.retrieveAttributes().

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItemByVsId(_:version:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item by using the provided version series id and version. If the version is not provided, the most current version that is available is retrieved.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItemByVsId(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item by using the provided version series id synchronously. The most current version that is available is retrieved.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItemWithAttributes(_:templateName:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item with all of its attributes and properties included using the provided unique identifier. This retrieval will take longer than the retrieveItem() since it will be returning more information.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveItemWithAttributes(_:templateName:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves an item with all of its attributes and properties included using the provided unique identifier synchronously. This retrieval will take longer than the retrieveItem() since it will be returning more information.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes(_:templateName:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves all the attributes and properties of an item using the provided item’s id. The attributes will be split into three categories in this order: system properties, user properties, item properties.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveMultiItems(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves one or more items using the provided item’s id. This provides a bulk and efficient way to retrieve multiple items. Use this instead of retrieveItem() if you need to retrieve more than one item.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveMultiCurrentItemsByVsIds(_:itemIds:versions:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves one or more items based on their ids, or on the version series identifiers and the version options.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentItemVersion(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves one version of the content item based on its id.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentItemVersion(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves one version of the content item based on its id synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentItemAllVersions(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves all versions of an item using the provided item’s id.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentItemAllVersions(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves all versions of an item using the provided item’s id synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:teamspaceId:templateName:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:fileURL:addAsMinorVersion:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document to the repository using the provided file as the source.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:teamspaceId:templateName:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:content:addAsMinorVersion:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document to the repository using the content in memory as the source.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:teamspaceId:templateName:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:content:addAsMinorVersion:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document to the repository using the content in memory as the source synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:teamspaceId:templateName:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:fileURL:addAsMinorVersion:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document to the repository using the provided file as the source synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addFolderItem(_:parentFolderId:teamspaceId:properties:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new folder to the repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:parentFolderId:teamspaceId:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:content:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document using an entry template to the repository using the content in memory as the source.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addDocumentItem(_:parentFolderId:teamspaceId:contentSourceType:properties:mimeType:fileName:fileURL:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new document using an entry template to the repository using the provided file as the source.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addFolderItem(_:parentFolderId:teamspaceId:properties:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new folder using an entry template to the repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addFolderItem(_:parentFolderId:teamspaceId:properties:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a new folder to the repository synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentClass(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieve content classes with specified class id for this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveContentClasses(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieve content classes with specified class id for this repository with a filter type.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: deleteItems(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Deletes the following items from the repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: deleteItems(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Deletes the following items from the repository synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: connectToRepository(_:password:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Connects to this repository and authenticates with the provided credentials.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: findGroups(_:searchString:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Finds and retrieves any groups that match the provided criteria. You can obtain the list of directories to search from using retrieveDirectories().

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: findUsers(_:searchString:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Finds and retrieves any users that match the provided criteria. You can obtain the list of directories to search from using retrieveDirectories().

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveDirectories(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves all directories for this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: getUserRegistryEntry(_:isEmail:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Returns user registry entry.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveTeamspaceById(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves a teamspace with the provided teamspace’s id.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: editTeamspaceTemplate(_:modifyWorkspace:modifyUsers:modifyRoles:teamspace:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Edits a teamspace template using the provided options.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: searchAdHoc(_:teamspaceId:searchClasses:objectType:searchPredicates:textSearchPredicate:orderBy:descending:pageSize:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Performs an-hoc search using the provided search parameters for this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: searchAdHoc(_:teamspaceId:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Searches document and folder by using the provided IBMECMSearchTemplate object. You can create a search template by using IBMECMSearchTemplateBuilder.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: moveToFolder(_:sourceFolderId:items:targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Moves a list of items from the provided source folder to the target folder.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: moveToFolder(_:sourceFolderId:items:targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Moves a list of items from source folder to target folder synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveChangesList(_:lastUpdateTS:changesSince:changesUntil:marker:registrationIds:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves a list of changes made to the synced items in this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveChangesList(_:lastUpdateTS:changesSince:changesUntil:marker:registrationIds:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves a list of changes made to the synced items in this repository synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveFoldersFiledIn(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves a list of folders that a document is filed into.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveFoldersFiledIn(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves a list of folders that a document is filed into synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: downloadDocumentContent(_:templateName:version:vsId:partNumber:filePathToSaveAs:useSuggestedFileName:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Downloads the document’s content to a file location.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: downloadDocumentContent(_:templateName:version:vsId:partNumber:filePathToSaveAs:useSuggestedFileName:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Downloads the document’s content to a file location.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: isTextSearchEnabled()
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Returns whether text search is enabled on this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveSearchTemplates(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves all the search templates stored on this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveReleasedSearchTemplate(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves the released version of a search template by version series id.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveReleasedSearchTemplateById(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves the released version of a search template by document id.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addSearchTemplate(_:permissions:searchFolderId:searchClasses:objectType:searchPredicates:textSearchPredicate:orderBy:descending:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Adds a search template to this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: addSearchTemplate(_:permissions:searchTemplate:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Add a search template using the provided IBMECMSearchTemplate object to this repository.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveEntryTemplates(filterType:folderDocid:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves the Entry Template list using filter type.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveEntryTemplateContent(entryTemplateId:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves the Entry Template list using the repository ID and filter type.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrievePermissions(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieve the permissions.

Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.name: retrieveDefaultInstancePermissions(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMRepository.html#/s:10IBM.abstract: Retrieves the default instance permissions for a content class.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: itemId
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The id of the item associated with this favorite. This is the item that this favorite is providing quick access to.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: vsId
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The version series id of the item associated with this favorite.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: syncRepositoryId
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The id of the repository registered for the sync server.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: isSyncEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Whether the item associated with this favorite is enabled for sync.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: hidden
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Whether this favorite is hidden.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: repositoryId
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The repository id of this favorite item.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: mimeType
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The MIME type of the item associated with this favorite.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: syncId
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The id of the sync item if the item associated with this favorite has been enabled for sync. This will return nil if isSyncEnabled() is false.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: templateName
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The id of the IBMECMContentClass instance. This content class is based on the item associated with this favorite.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: type
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The type of this favorite. For example, folder, teamspace, document.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: subType
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The subtype of this favorite. For example, personal folder.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: hasContent
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Whether the item associated with this favorite has content.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: repository
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: The repository object that the current item belongs to.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: isPersonalFolder()
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Returns whether this favorite is also a personal folder.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: remove(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Removes this favorite item.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: load(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Loads the item associated with this favorite and returns a reference to it. The loaded item is the item that this favorite item is accessing.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: getFavoriteType()
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Returns the type of this favorite.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: getContentItem()
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Returns the content item if the favorited item is a content item.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: getTeamspace()
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Returns the teamspace object if the favorited item is a teamspace.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.name: getTeamspaceContentItem()
Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html#/s:10IBMEC.abstract: Returns the teamspace content object if the favorited item is a teamspace.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: vsId
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The object’s version series identifier. This is applicable only if the object is versionable. The version identifier is used to group different versions of content items together.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: type
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The entry template type.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: mimetype
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The minetype of the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: desc
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The description of the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: displayName
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The display name of the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isCurrentFolderAsParent
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the current folder as the parent folder.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: repository
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The IBMECMRepository object where the entry template is stored.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: contentClass
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The content class of this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: contentClassId
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The content class Id of this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: contentClassName
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The content class Name of this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: contentClassLabel
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The content class label of this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: contentClassDesc
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The content class description of this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isUsedForDocumentInformationProperties
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template should be used on the document information pane.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowUserSelectSaveChoice
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the What do you want to save pull-down menu is displayd to the user.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isInheritingSecurityFromParentFolder
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the entry template inherits Security From Parent Folder.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isUsedForViewerProperties
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the entry template is used for viewer properties.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: properties
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: An array of IBMECMAttributeDefinition objects that specifies the property display order and property options such as hidden, read only, etc.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowUserSelectFolder
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template will allow the user to select the folder under which the new content item will be filed.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isUsedForCheckin
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template should be applied when a document added using this entry template is checked in.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isUsedForProperties
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the entry template is used for properties view.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowNoFolderSelected
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the user can select the repository as the destination without filing the document in a folder.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: permissions
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: An array of IBMECMAccessControlEntry objects specifying the security for the new content item.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: addClassName
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: A string holding the content class name.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowSaveLocalDocument
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: whether the What do you want to save pull-down menu contains Local document.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowDuplicateFileNames
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowUserSelectFile
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template will allow the user to select the content file.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: securityPolicy
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowUserSetPropertyValues
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template will allow the user to set property values.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isEnabledCompoundDocuments
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowSavePropertiesOnly
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the What do you want to save pull-down menu contains Information about a document.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: templatePermissions
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: An array of Permission objects specifying the security for the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: teamspaceDefault
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: A string that indicates if this entry template is the default for a teamspace.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: overrideClassSecurity
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template overrides the security defined by the class.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: allowUserSetSecurity
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template allows the user to modify security settings.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: targetRepositoryId
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The destination repository Id for content added using this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isAutoClassify
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: saveToFolderInheritParentSecurity
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only. A boolean value indicating whether this entry template inherits security from the parent folder.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: restrictToSelectedFolderOrDescendant
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether this entry template only allows the user to select the specified folder or a sub-folder as the folder under which the new content item will be filed.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: fileTypesFilter
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The specified file types when associating the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: isDefault
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether the entry template is a default one.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: saveInFolder
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: The folder object under which the new content item will be filed.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: asMinorVersion
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Whether add or check in documents as a minor version.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: objectStoreId
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: FileNet P8 only. The destination object store for content added using this entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: combineAttributeDefinictions(attributeDefinitions:)
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Combines the incoming attributes definitions with the properties of the entry template.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: getShortEntryTemplateId()
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Gets the short entry template ID, which is used when interacting with ICN servers.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: hasDependentAttributes()
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Returns whether this entry template has dependent attributes.

Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.name: retrieveDependentAttributeInfo(_:context:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMEntryTemplate.html#/s:10.abstract: Retrieves information about dependent attributes for the entry template. The information is related to the external data service (EDS).

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isConnected
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether this desktop has been authenticated and connected. It initially is false until a login is performed.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: userId
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The id of the user that is connected to this desktop. It initially is nil until a login is performed.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: userDisplayName
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The display name of the user that is connected to this desktop. It initially is nil until a login is performed.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: syncServerEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether the sync server is enabled for this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: editServiceEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether or not the edit service is enabled for this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: repositories
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: An array of repositories that this desktop is managing.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: currentRepository
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The repository that is currently in use by the desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: defaultRepository
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The default repository defined for the desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: securityToken
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The security token for the desktop. If you make custom requests to the IBM Content Navigator server, you must append the security token on every request. Without the security token, your request will be rejected with an error. The request parameter’s name is “securityToken”.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: serverVersion
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The version number for IBM Content Navigator. The version is typically in some form of dot notation with the fix pack version number appended to it.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isMobileApplicationEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether mobile application access is enabled.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isAddPhotoFromMobileEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether adding a photo from a mobile application is enabled.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isAddDocFoldersToRepositoryEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether the mobile application can add document folders to a repository.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isOpenDocumentFromOtherApplicationEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether the mobile application can open a document from another application.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: adminEmailAddress
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The mobile administrator’s support email address. This field can be used to automatically populate the mobile client with a custom support email address.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: mobileDownloadEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Whether downloading documents on mobile devices is allowed for this desktop. Configuration is available since IBM Content Navigator Version 3.0.9 Interim Fix 1.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: theme
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: The mobile theme defined in this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: favorites
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: An array of all the favorites defined in this desktop for the current user. This is nil until the retrieveFavorites() call is made.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: helpUrl
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: A customized help URL link defined in this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: fileTypes
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: An array of the file type filters

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isFeatureInstalled(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Returns whether the provided featureId is installed for this desktop. Each desktop maintains a list of features that it can access.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveFavorites(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves all the favorites defined in this desktop for the current user.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveFavorites()
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves all the favorites defined in this desktop for the current user synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: removeFromFavorites(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Removes an array of IBMECMFavorite objects for the current user.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveSyncItems(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves all sync items defined in this desktop for the current user.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveSyncItems()
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves all sync items defined in this desktop for the current user synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: enableSync(forContentItems:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Enables sync for for the provided items. This method adds the provided items to the server-side list of sync items for this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: enableSync(forTeamspaces:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Enables sync for a teamspace. This method adds the provided items to the server-side list of sync items for this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: disableSync(forSyncItems:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Disables sync for the provided items. This method removes the provided items from the server-side list of sync items for this desktop.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: registerSyncItemsForDevice(forSyncItems:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Registers an array of IBMECMSyncItem object for this device or sync client to receive notifications and to also start syncing these items.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: registerSyncItemsForDevice(forSyncItems:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Registers an array of IBMECMSyncItem object for this device or sync client to receive notifications and to also start syncing these items synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: unregisterSyncItemsForDevice(forSyncItems:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Unregisters an array of synced items for this device to stop receiving notifications and to disable syncing these items for this device.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: unregisterSyncItemsForDevice(forSyncItems:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Unregisters an array of synced items for this device to stop receiving notifications and to disable syncing these items for this device synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveMyPersonalFolder(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves the current user’s personal folder.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isServerSupported()
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Returns whether the SDK supports the current version IBM Content Navigator provided.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: isMobileAccessAllowed()
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Returns whether this desktop allows mobile access.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: retrieveRepositories(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Retrieves the repositories to which the desktop can connect.

Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.name: decryptShortLink(encryptedData:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMDesktop.html#/s:10IBMECM.abstract: Decrypt a short encrypted link.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: vsId
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The object’s version series identifier. This is applicable only if the object is versionable. The version identifier is used to group different versions of content items together.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: currentVersion
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Specifies whether this version is the current version of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: versionStatus
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The version status of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: parent
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The containment parent of this content item. This is applicable only if the content item is containable.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: myRecommendation
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The current user’s recommendation of this content item. A recommendation means the current user “liked” the item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: recommendationCount
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The recommendation count, that is, the count of all the “likes,” on this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: commentCount
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The number of comments made on this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: downloadCount
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The number of times that this content item was downloaded by any user.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: tags
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: An array of all the tag values that have been assigned to this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isFolder
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Whether this content item is a folder.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: contentSize
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The size of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: dateLastModified
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The last modified date time of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: properties
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The properties of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: propertyTypes
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The property types of this content item’s properties.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: privileges
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The current user’s privileges on this item. The privileges are contained in a bitmask that indicates what the current user can do. For more information about what each bit means, see IBMECMPrivilege.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: pathName
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The full path of this content item in the repository. For example, “/root/folder1/folder2/document”

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: fileName
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The file name of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isSyncEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Whether this content item is enabled for sync.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isFavoriteEnabled
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Whether this content item is a favorite.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: templateName
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The template name of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: contentClass
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The content class of this content item. The IBMECMContentClass defines the template of how this item is constructed.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: mimetype
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The MIME type of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: repositoryId
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The repository id of the repository that this content item belongs to.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: entryTemplateId
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The entry template id in case of the content item was created via an entry template

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: entryTemplate
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The entry template that was used when adding the content item

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: repository
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The repository object that this content item belongs to.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: showCheckoutForReservation
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Whether this content item is checked out (that is, reserved).

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: capabilityComment
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The scope of the current user’s capability to make comments on this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: element
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Either the part number for a Content Manager multi-part document, or the element id for a FileNet P8 multi-element document.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveFolderContent(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves subfolders and content in a folder. The default page size is 25.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveFolderContent(_:orderBy:descending:pageSize:teamspaceId:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves a folder’s contents. Use the options to control how the results are returned.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveFolderContent(_:orderBy:descending:pageSize:teamspaceId:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves a folder’s contents synchronously. Use the options to control how the results are returned.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveContentClass(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves the class of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: checkIn(_:templateName:contentSourceType:mimetype:data:properties:asMinorVersion:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Checks in a new version of a document using data in memory. If the document is not already checked out, an exception occurs. You can also use updateDocumentItem(), which performs a checkout and checkin in one collective call.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: checkIn(_:templateName:contentSourceType:mimetype:fileURL:properties:asMinorVersion:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Checks in a new version of a document from data on the device as specified by the file URL. If the document is not already checked out, an exception occurs. You can also use updateDocumentItem(), which performs a checkout and checkin in one collective call.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getDocumentURL()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns the HTTP URL that points directly to the document content for download.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getDocumentBookmarkLink()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns the HTTP URL that points to the document in the IBM Content Navigator interface. This URL is a bookmark link that others can use to view, access, and download the content.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isCheckedOut()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether the document is already checked out.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: checkout(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Checks out a document. Checking out a document effectively locks the document and prevents changes by other users.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: checkout()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Checks out a document synchronously. Checking out a document effectively locks the document and prevents changes by other users.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: cancelCheckout(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Cancels the checkout on a document. The document must already be checked out. This effectively unlocks the document so others can make changes to it.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: cancelCheckout()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Cancels the checkout on a document synchronously. The document must already be checked out. This effectively unlocks the document so others can make changes to it.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: updateDocumentItem(_:properties:mimeType:fileName:updateAsMinorVersion:content:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Update the content of a document from data in memory in a single call. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: updateDocumentItem(_:properties:mimeType:fileName:fileURL:updateAsMinorVersion:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Update the content of a document from data on the device as specified by the file URL. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: updateDocumentItem(_:properties:mimeType:fileName:updateAsMinorVersion:content:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Update the content of a document synchronously from data in memory in a single call. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: updateDocumentItem(_:properties:mimeType:fileName:fileURL:updateAsMinorVersion:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Update the content of a document synchronously from data on the device as specified by the file URL.. This effectively performs a checkout if needed and then a checkin of the updated content.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveAttributes(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves all or the remaining attributes and properties for this content item. Remaining attributes include recommendations, tags, download count, and comment count.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: saveAttributes(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Saves the new attributes to this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: moveToFolder(_:sourceFolderId:targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Moves this content item from a source folder to a target folder.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: moveToFolder(_:sourceFolderId:targetFolderIsTeamspaceFolder:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Moves this content item from a source folder to a target folder synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveComments(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves comments for this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveRecommendations(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves all recommendations, or “likes”, for this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: addRecommendation(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Adds the current user’s recommendation, or “like”, for this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: deleteRecommendation(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Deletes the current user’s recommendation, or a “like”, for this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: addComment(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Adds a new comment for this content item

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: deleteComment(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Deletes a comment from this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: addToFavorite(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Adds this item as a new favorite. Favorites are a list of items maintained in each IBM Content Navigator’s desktop for quicker access.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: enableSync(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Enables sync for the current item. After sync is enabled, this item appears in a sync list and is tracked. For any registered sync clients, such as mobile devices, this content item is automatically downloaded when the sync process runs.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: registerObject(_:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Registers an object for syncing purposes to declare interest in receiving notification of changes to the object.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: registerObject(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Registers an object for syncing purposes to declare interest in receiving notification of changes to the object synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveDocumentItem(_:onComplete:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves and downloads the document content from this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveDocumentItem(_:progress:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves and downloads the document content from this content item synchronously.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: retrieveCategorizedItemAttributes(onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Retrieves all the attributes and properties of this item . The attributes will be split into three categories in this order: system properties, user properties, item properties.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: hasPrivilege(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether the specified privilege is granted to the current user for this item. See IBMECMPrivilege for the full set of available privileges.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getThumbnailMimeType()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns the MIME type of the thumbnail for this content item. This is only applicable for documents.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getThumbnail()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns the thumbnail for this content item. This is only applicable for documents.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isWorkingCopy()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether this content item is a working copy.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getParentFolderId()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns the parent folder id of this content item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isRoot()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether this content item is a root folder item.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isEmpty()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether this content item is empty.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: isSearchTemplate()
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns whether this content item is a search template.

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.name: getFriendlyNameForMimeType(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Returns a friendly name for this content item’s MIME type.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: repositoryId
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: The id of the repository that this content class belongs to.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: pseudoClass
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Whether this content class is a pseudo class.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: allowInstances
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Whether this content class can have instances on the server. This is typically used to determine if a user has permission to create an instance of this class.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: parentClassId
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: The content class id (symbolic name) of the parent content class of this content class. The value is not assigned until the IBMECMContentClass method retrieveContentClassAttributeDefinitions is called.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: forFoldersOnly
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Whether this content class is supported only for folders

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: classification
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: The classification for the content class. This is for IBM Content Manager only.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: storesContent
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Whether this class can store content. This is for IBM Content Manager only.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: nameAttribute
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: The name attribute value for this content class. This is for IBM Content Manager only.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: hierarchical
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Whether this class is hierarchical. This is for IBM Content Manager only.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: repository
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: The repository object which this class belongs to.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: attributeDefinitions
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: An array of attribute definitions for this content class.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: retrieveContentClassAttributeDefinitions(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.abstract: Retrieves the definitions of attributes, including system attributes of this content class.

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html#/s:10I.name: retrieveContentClassAttributeDefinitions(_:onComplete:)

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: isPasswordPersistAllowed
Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Whether to allow password persistence. If set to true, this application will persist an encrypted password as part of the login. Persisting the password provides a way to log in without asking for credentials every time.

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.abstract: The IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource object set in this application. An authenticator datasource is used to provide custom authentication for this application.

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Loads the default desktop for this application. A desktop provides a number of configuration and repositories that this application will be accessing.

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: loadDesktop()

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: unloadDesktop()

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: login(_:password:onComplete:)

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: login(_:password:deviceId:onComplete:)
Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.abstract: Logs in to this application. The login performs the appropriate container login or repository login as specified by the desktop and repository settings in IBM Content Navigator.

Protocols/IBMECMApplication.html#/s:10IB.name: logoff(_:)

Protocols/IBMECMAccessControlEntry.html#.name: inheritableDepth

Protocols/IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource..name: customAuthenticationIsRequiredForUrl(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource..abstract: This method is called every time authentication is about to take place. When this method is invoked, it gives you the opportunity to inspect the URL and decide whether the custom authentication mechanism is applicable. This decision might be as simple as the URL pointing to a well-known host name or it might require a round trip to that server in order to understand what authentication method is required. Either a true or false value must be returned.

Protocols/IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource..name: customAuthenticationForUrl(_:)
Protocols/IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource..abstract: This method is called only if the method ‘customAuthenticationIsRequiredForUrl’ returned a value of true for the same URL. If so, the IBMECMCore framework invokes this method to solicit the custom authentication method that you want to use. The return of this method must be an instance of IBMECMAuthenticator so that IBMECMCore has a reference to the class and calls it as it needs it.

Protocols/IBMECMAttributeDefinition.html.name: IBMECMAttributeDefinition

Protocols/IBMECMContentClass.html.name: IBMECMContentClass

Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html.name: IBMECMContentItem
Protocols/IBMECMContentItem.html.abstract: Represents a single content item in the repository. Content items include documents (has content), folders (for storage), and other items stored in a repository. Each content item is associated with a content class that describes the metadata for the item.

Protocols/IBMECMFavorite.html.name: IBMECMFavorite

Favorites are stored as a global list on a IBMECMDesktop. Clients can present this list to users to give them access to their favorite items,

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: sharedConcurrentQueue
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: A singleton instance of a shared customized concurrent queue.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getCurrentApplication()
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Returns a reference to the current application if it exists. If no applications have been set yet, this will return nil.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getApplication(_:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Returns an instance of IBMECMApplication based on the IBM Content Navigator URL that is passed in.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getApplication(_:authenticatorDataSource:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Returns an instance of IBMECMApplication based on the IBM Content Navigator URL that is passed in. Use this method to provide a data source for custom authentication use cases.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getCurrentRepository(_:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Returns a reference to the current IBMECMRepository. The current repository is the default repository set in the default desktop for the application.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getIBMECMResultSet(items:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Constructs an instance of IBMECMResultSet with the specified array of IBMECMContentItem.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getIBMECMContentClass(id:name:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Constructs an instance of IBMECMContentClass with the specified parameters.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getIBMECMAttributeDefinition(id:name:dataType:cardinality:required:readOnly:hidden:maxLength:minLength:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Constructs an instance of IBMECMAttributeDefinition with the specified parameters.

Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.name: getIBMECMTeamspace(id:name:templateName:)
Classes/IBMECMFactory.html#/s:10IBMECMCo.abstract: Constructs an instance of IBMECMTeamspace with the specified parameters.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: add(_:value:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Adds or updates an IBMECMItemProperty to this collection. If the collection already contains a property with the same id, then the existing instance is updated with the new property value.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: add(_:value:label:displayValue:dataType:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Adds or updates an IBMECMItemProperty to this collection. If the collection already contains a property with the same id, then the existing instance is updated with the new property value.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: add(_:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Adds or updates the specified IBMECMItemProperty instance to this collection. If the collection already contains a property with the same symbolic name, then the existing instance is replaced by the new IBMECMItemProperty instance.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: isPropertyPresent(_:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Returns if the collection contains an IBMECMItemProperty instance corresponding to the specified id.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: remove(_:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Removes the specified {@link IBMECMItemProperty} from this collection.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: get(_:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Returns if the collection contains an IBMECMAccessControlEntry instance corresponding to the specified grantee id.

Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.name: getValue(_:)
Classes/IBMECMItemProperties.html#/s:10I.abstract: Returns the value of the IBMECMItemProperty instance as specified by its id string.
